browse_labware.instructions: Hover on a well to see contents

tip_position.title: Tip Positioning
tip_position.body: Change from where in the well the robot aspirates

well_order.title: Well Order
well_order.body: Change the order in which the robot aspirates from the selected wells

global_step_changes.heading: Changes to steps in protocol
global_step_changes.all_steps_header: All steps using a changed pipette will clear the following advanced settings:
global_step_changes.all_steps_cleared_settings: Flow rate, Mix, Air Gap, and Disposal Volume
global_step_changes.next_tip_size_smaller: Switching to a smaller tip size
global_step_changes.tip_use_may_increase: Number of tips used may increase
